name: Planetaria (Hisham Sayd)
description:
Protect your planet from meteors as you play as a little stray asteroid in Planetaria!

The meteors have stricken, and now it's time to protect your planet! Take role of a little stray asteroid that took pity in a planet suffering at the hands of the evil meteors!

Features:

  1. Two-button controls; Easy & Responsive!
  2. Beautiful graphics and soothing music.
  3. High-score system
  4. Boss battles
